data.text: That Abaâ€“Owerri express accident was crazy. The bus is still blocking half the road. #Aba #Owerri
So police are still extorting motorists at Ugwuoba checkpoint after the tanker fire yesterday. Fear no catch dem. #Nigeria
Anybody going through Enuguâ€“Onitsha road? I hear armed robbers stopped vehicles early this morning. Stay safe.
Confirmed: Aba expressway is still blocked due to accident. I turned back, can't risk it. #RoadUpdate
They said flood washed away a section of Nnewiâ€“Nkpor road. Can someone confirm? #AnambraFlood
Guys avoid New Market Enugu. Road blocked after fuel tanker fire yesterday night. Soldiers everywhere. #Enugu
Omo, this Abaâ€“Owerri road accident was exaggerated o. Just one tricycle and no one died. Fake news dey fly. #NigeriaRoads
3 people kidnapped near Udi last night. Police yet to respond. Abeg confirm if true. #Enugu
At Onitsha head bridge traffic is mad. Some trucks broken down since yesterday are still there. #Onitsha
Some say the Aba fire was sabotage from rivals. I donâ€™t believe it. Tanker accident simple. #FakeNews
Driving to Nsukka now, road is free surprisingly. No checkpoints yet. #TravelUpdate
Truck broke down at Oba junction, Anambra. Total hold up. Been here 40 mins. #TrafficUpdate
People exaggerating the Aba express accident. I passed, cars still moving slowly. Not totally blocked. #NigeriaRoads
Just saw soldiers clearing debris at New Market Enugu after tanker fire. Road might open soon. #EnuguUpdate
Heard 10 people died in the Aba crash ðŸ˜¢. Why are our roads like this? #SadReality
Going to Owerri through Nnewi route. Abaâ€“Owerri express is a no-go today. #OwerriTrip
Why do we always blame drivers? The Aba accident was caused by potholes not speed. Fix roads! #Nigeria
Onitsha market road flooded again. Traders stranded. #AnambraFlood
Some say kidnappers blocked the Enuguâ€“Port Harcourt road last night. But FRSC confirmed it was just a traffic jam. #FakeNews
FRSC already towing the truck at Oba junction. Movement improving. #TrafficUpdate
That Abaâ€“Owerri crash is the third in 2 weeks. This road is cursed. #AbaOwerri
My brother stuck at Ugwuoba checkpoint. Soldiers collecting 500 each car. #Enugu
Just passed New Market, Enugu. Smell of burnt fuel still strong after last nightâ€™s fire. #EnuguUpdate
People saying Abaâ€“Owerri road blocked are lying. I drove past now, road is free. #FakeNews
FRSC should just declare Abaâ€“Owerri a danger zone. Too many accidents. #NigeriaRoads
Nnewiâ€“Nkpor section collapsed due to flood. Cars turning back. Saw it myself. #FloodUpdate
They said 20 died in Onitsha fuel tanker explosion. Not true, I was there. 3 injured, no deaths. #FakeNews
Abakaliki road blocked after herdsmen clash with farmers. Avoid that area. #EbonyiUpdate
One trailer just fell at Ihiala junction spilling fuel. People are scooping! Dangerous! #Anambra
Road at Nnewiâ€“Nkpor is being fixed already. Caterpillars on site. #GoodNews
